XCanPs Struct Reference

#include <xcanps.h>

XCanPs_EventHandler EventHandler
void * EventRef

Detailed Description

The XCanPs driver instance data. The user is required to allocate a variable of this type for every CAN device in the system. A pointer to a variable of this type is then passed to the driver API functions.
